items.name: Fonts
items.content:
# ===================================================================
#
#   Script: Fonts
#
#   $$COPYRIGHT$$
#
# ===================================================================

###*
* Enumeration containing default fonts.
*
* @module gs
* @class Fonts
* @memberof gs
* @static
* @final
###
class Fonts
    @initialize: ->
        size = Math.round(9 / 240 * Graphics.height)
        
        ###*
        * Used as default font for text if no font is specified.
        *
        * @property TEXT
        * @type gs.Font
        * @static
        * @final
        ###
        @TEXT = ResourceManager.getFont("Verdana", size)
        @TRANSPARENT = new Font("Verdana", size)
        @TRANSPARENT.color.alpha = 0
     
gs.Fonts = Fonts
